title: Homepage Load and Content Verification
description: Verify that the homepage loads successfully displaying the hero section and services grid with correct content and responsive layout.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage URL
Check that the hero section is displayed with correct text and images
Validate that the services grid is visible with all listed puja services
Verify the page layout adjusts correctly across desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes

title: Dynamic Puja Service Page Content and SEO Metadata
description: Ensure dynamic puja service pages load the correct content based on the URL puja name parameter and include accurate SEO metadata and JSON-LD schema.

steps.description: Navigate to a puja service page using a valid puja name in the URL
Verify the page displays puja service details relevant to the given parameter
Check for presence and accuracy of SEO metadata tags (title, description, keywords)
Validate the JSON-LD structured data schema is present and correctly describes the puja service

title: Booking Form Validation and Submission Success
description: Check that the booking form enforces required fields, correct formats, and processes submissions successfully via the API route.

steps.description: Navigate to a puja service booking form
Fill the form with valid data for all required fields
Submit the booking form
Confirm that form validation passes without errors
Check API endpoint returns a success response confirming the booking
Verify the UI displays a successful submission confirmation message

title: Booking Form Validation - Error Handling for Invalid Inputs
description: Validate booking form rejects invalid inputs such as missing required fields, incorrect email formats, or invalid phone numbers and displays appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Navigate to the booking form
Leave required fields empty and attempt to submit the form
Verify validation errors are displayed for each missing required field
Enter invalid email formats and invalid phone numbers
Confirm validation error messages for invalid formats appear
Try submitting the form with invalid data
Check form submission is blocked until corrections are made

title: API Route Error Handling for Booking Form Submission
description: Test the booking API route returns appropriate error responses when invalid or incomplete data is submitted.

steps.description: Submit booking data with missing required fields via API endpoint
Confirm API returns 400 Bad Request with descriptive error messages
Submit booking data with invalid field formats via API endpoint
Verify API returns validation error responses with appropriate status codes

title: Breadcrumb Navigation Correctness
description: Ensure breadcrumb navigation accurately reflects the hierarchical path for any page and links navigate correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to various pages including homepage, puja service pages, and informative pages
Check breadcrumb shows correct hierarchical path for current page
Click breadcrumb links for parent pages
Verify navigation to the corresponding pages is successful

title: Reusable Component Rendering Consistency
description: Verify Button, Header, Footer, and other reusable components render correctly and consistently across different pages and screen sizes.

steps.description: Visit multiple pages including homepage, puja service, and FAQ
Confirm Header component displays with correct elements and layout
Check Footer component presence and correctness
Validate Button components are styled consistently and respond to user interaction
Resize browser window to tablet and mobile widths
Ensure all reusable components adjust layout and remain usable

title: Analytics Tracking of User Interaction and Page Views
description: Verify that the analytics component captures and logs user events like page visits, form submissions, and button clicks correctly.

steps.description: Navigate through multiple pages on the site
Check that page view events are sent to the analytics service for each page visited
Perform user interactions such as clicking Call-to-Action buttons and submitting booking form
Verify that respective event data for user actions is captured and logged

title: WhatsApp Contact Button Functionality
description: Ensure the WhatsApp contact button is always visible on pages, launches WhatsApp chat correctly with predefined contact number when clicked.

steps.description: Open various pages such as homepage, service pages, and FAQ
Verify WhatsApp button is visible and styled properly
Click the WhatsApp contact button
Confirm that clicking the button opens WhatsApp application or WhatsApp Web with the correct contact number preloaded

title: Access and Content Verification for Informative Pages
description: Confirm accessibility and correctness of content on About, FAQ, Contact, Testimonials, and Muhurat Calendar pages including all internal functional links.

steps.description: Navigate to About, FAQ, Contact, Testimonials, and Muhurat Calendar pages
Verify each page loads without errors with correct and complete content
Check all links on these pages (internal and external) are functional and navigate correctly

title: Puja Service Locations and Related Pujas Display
description: Validate that the PujaServiceLocations and RelatedPujas components correctly display relevant locations and related puja suggestions to aid user decision-making.

steps.description: Open a puja service page
Confirm PujaServiceLocations component shows correct location information for the service
Verify RelatedPujas component lists relevant puja suggestions
Click on related puja links
Check navigation to the corresponding related puja service pages
